entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 15 TO 20

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
COLD WITH LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
HIGHS 15 TO 20
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS ZERO AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
